page.title: 11FOOTBALL IN GORDON
page.content: We have a school football team.There are 2 primary fours,4 primary fives and 2 primary sixes.It is 7_a_side this season.Chris Henderson trains us he plays football at Greenlaw.We train once a week on Sundays.The team trains in the school hall.Our strips are red with black shorts and socks.We got them from the school fund raised by the P.T.A.(Parent Teacher association.)There is a football pitch at the bottom of the park.I have scored 12 goals and I am top scorer. We are in the west league.We play Greenlaw,Morebattle and Yethlom. Football is a very skillful game.I like it because I enjoy passing,scoring and practising tactics.I think alcohol in football grounds should be banned because of the violence
